component_summary.name: Menubar
component_summary.description: Collection of styled menubar primitives built on @radix-ui/react-menubar. Provides a full-featured menubar API (triggers, submenus, groups, radio/checkbox items, labels, separators, portals) with project styling and icon indicators.

components_and_behaviors.name: Menubar
components_and_behaviors.description: Root menubar container with consistent height, padding and rounded styling.

components_and_behaviors.name: MenubarTrigger / MenubarContent / MenubarSubContent
components_and_behaviors.description: Trigger and content wrappers that handle alignment, portals, animation classes and consistent styling.

components_and_behaviors.name: MenubarItem / MenubarCheckboxItem / MenubarRadioItem
components_and_behaviors.description: Menu item variants with focus/disabled states and item indicators (Check / Circle icons) wired to Radix primitives.

components_and_behaviors.name: MenubarSubTrigger / MenubarSubContent
components_and_behaviors.description: Submenu support with ChevronRight indicator and inset handling for nested items.

components_and_behaviors.name: MenubarShortcut
components_and_behaviors.description: Small helper element to render keyboard shortcut text aligned to the right.

notes: Presentation layer only; behavior & accessibility delegated to Radix primitives.
Consistent pattern across UI primitives: forwardRef wrappers + cn utility for classes.
Low duplication risk; keep styling utility centralized (cn in lib/utils).
